entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow before morning. Risk of thundershowers early this evening. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016
